ml_tags: In loving memory of Peter  Calyon Loving partner of Irene Beloved father of Stefan, Jarome, Loretta, Chonoa & Peta Muched loved brother, Uncle, Cousin & Pop to many Son of Jennifer Dec & Lyall Dec The lord is my light and salvation Whom shall I fear The lord is the strength of my life Of whom shall I be afraid 01/08/1978 - 29/01/2012 CALYON
